import React from "react" import { useMemo } from "react" import { Link, useParams } from "react-router-dom" import { Button } from "reactstrap" const SingleNote = ({posts}) => { const params = useParams() const currentPost = useMemo(() => posts.find(post => post.id === parseInt(params.id)), [params.id, posts]) return(

{currentPost.title}

{currentPost.note}

) } export default SingleNote
